name: Asteroid Omicron
description:
Overview

Investigate an abandoned mining station on an asteroid by collecting upgrades and fighting enemies.

Controls Game
  • Move: Directional Keys
  • Shoot: A
  • Dash*: S
  • Use magnet*: D (when facing magnetic wall)
  • Toggle magnet type*: D (when not facing magnetic wall)
  • View map: Space
  • Use lift: Shift (when standing on lift)

*These abilities must be unlocked before they can be used.

Menus
  • Select: Directional Keys
  • Confirm: A
Other
  • Cancel/quit: Escape
  • Change scale: F3
  • Toggle fullscreen: F4
Credits
  • Small font taken from here: http://www.dafont.com/extremely-small-fonts.font
  • Everything else by Veralos
